INFO.title: Title: The text on the page "Compliance & Legals" is displayed in bold and underlined when switching to AR
INFO.steps: Steps: 1. Navigate to capital.com 2. Hover the cursor over Menu section [More] 3. Click on the Menu item [Compliance & Legals] 4. Select language AR 5. Scroll down"
INFO.exprected:
Expected Result: "The text in the paragraphs on the page ""Compliance & Legals"" has the same font when switching to AR The text is wrapped in
"
Actual Result: "The text on the page ""Compliance & Legals"" is in bold and underlined when switching to AR The text is wrapped in and "
